document_data.name: ''Psychic Spark''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Psychic Spark''''' was an [[amulet]] that bolstered the spellcasting of the wearer with psychic energy.
document_data.Description: Each gem in the amulet was distinctly warm to the touch. It appeared if each of the gems were poised to ignite.
document_data.Powers: The wearer of ''Psychic Spark'' could cast the [[spell]] ''[[magic missile]]'' once per day. It also added an additional missile every time the spell was cast.
document_data.History: As of the {{YearlinkName|1492}}, the amulet remained in the possession of [[Blurg]], the [[orog]] member of the [[Society of Brilliance]].
